import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import "../styles/home.css"; export default function Home() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [direction, setDirection] = useState(null); const [transitioning, setTransitioning] = useState(false); const triggerTransition = (route, dir) => { setDirection(dir); // "left" or "right" setTransitioning(true); setTimeout(() => { navigate(route); }, 1000); // must match CSS animation duration }; return (
{/* Electric Sweep */} {transitioning && (
